```{r, include=FALSE}
install.packages('skimr')
install.packages('tidyverse')
install.packages('magrittr')
install.packages('ggplot2')
install.packages('heatmaply')
```
```{r install libraries}
library(skimr)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(heatmaply)

```


```{r run some code}
skim(mtcars)

mtcars$hp %>% hist()

mtcars %>% ggplot()+aes(x=hp,y=gear)+geom_point()
mtcars %>% heatmaply(scale='column')
```
